section_title: SPECIAL REPORT ON CARBON DIOXIDE CAPTURE AND STORAGE
sentences: Working Group III Co-Chair Metz said completion of this report has been delayed until September 2005 to take full account of new literature in the field (IPCC-XXII/Doc.14).
He noted an experiment in the review process being undertaken in which the expert review is being conducted anonymously to improve objectivity when responding to comments.
Austria, opposed by the Russian Federation, supported the experiment of using anonymous reviews.
Chair Pachauri noted that the outcomes of this experiment would be discussed by the Panel in due course.
